law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 1, effective August 1, 2013. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 2007. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 7, effective June 1, 2006; ch. 251, sec. 48, effective April 25, 2006; and ch. 252, Pt. XXXIII, sec. 1, effective April 25, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 346, effective June 20, 2005; and ch. 168, sec. 80, effective June 1, 2005. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 386, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 233, sec. 19, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 1. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 215, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4281e-1.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/1/2006). This section was amended by 2006 Ky. Acts chs. 6, sec. 7; 252, Pt. XXXIII, sec. 1, and 251, sec. 48, which specifically amends this statute as it appears in Section 1 of Part XXXIII of 2006 Regular Session HB 380/EN. These do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
